column3: so what we gon' do so what you gon' do so what we gon' do so what you gon' do   you said you'd never forget her and she said she could change your life it happened on the day you met her a love at first sight made you blind  pre but i warned you she wasn't who she claimed to be and no one could love you like me   cause nobody does it better i know you're sittin' at home cryin' cause you miss me nobody does it better you must be out of your mind boy what was you thinkin' yeah nobody does it  post no one no one nononobody does it no one no one nononobody does it better   don't throw your heart out in a letter cause i already read your mind you know you missed out on forever and settled for a waste of time  pre but i warned you she wasn't who she claimed to be and no one could love you like me   cause nobody does it better i know you're sittin' at home cryin' cause you miss me nobody does it better you must be out of your mind boy what was you thinkin' yeah nobody does it  post no one no one nononobody does it no one no one nononobody does it better  break  pre but i warned you she wasn't who she claimed to be and no one could love you like me   cause nobody does it better i know you're sittin' at home cryin' cause you miss me nobody does it better you must be out of your mind boy what was you thinkin' yeah nobody does it say no one say no one  post no one no one nononobody does it no one no one nononobody does it better   so what we gon' do nononobody does it so what you gon' do so what we gon' do nononobody does it better so what you gon' do nononobody does it better nononobody does it better
